p: Fresh N. megapotamica leaves were pulverized in an analytical mill, tamized (mesh 24), and 50 mg were extracted with methanol/water 7:3 (v/v) added 1% acetic acid in ultrasound bath for 10 minutes, and centrifuged at 3000 RPM for 10 minutes. The supernatants were collected, filtered (0.22 μM pore, membrane PTFE, Millex ® filters), and analyzed on LC-DAD-MS.
